title: Profile Customization
requirement:
Provide features for customizable user profiles, allowing users to showcase favorite genres, playlists, and listening habits interactively.  
#### Screens:  
* Profile Settings Screen: Enables editing displayed preferences, playlists, and genres.  
#### Personas:  
* Personalized User: Enjoys curating profile for tailored engagement.  
* Casual User: Prefers simple self-expression through favorite genres.
